title: Ticket #521: Hierarchical Matchmaking
description:
This ticket is the placeholder for plans to bring hierarchical matchmaking to Condor, and as a short-term byproduct, better scheduling into the schedd.

Milestones

  1. Merge in the resource request code from Todd's distributed computing project. 2 weeks

  2. Refactor the matchmaker and accountant code into one single class (aka the "green box"). 2 weeks

  3. Bring the capabilities of the matchmaker class down to the schedd, demonstrating that preemption and user-based accounting decisions can be made at the level of the submission point (schedd) . 2 weeks

  4. Create and enforce a durable lease on all matches created by the matchmaker class. 2 weeks
